Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of the Twenty-Four Priests:

Text.Language: Eybe je ceqent e~qoun e~Vnou]: ouoh eu,/ nahren pefy~ronoc: euhwc e~rof qen oumetatmounk: m~pie~hoou nem pie~jwrh.
Because they are near to God: and being before His throne: singing to Him ceaselessly: day and night.
